details.title: Interaction of C-reactive protein with artificial lipid containing monolayers studied by ellipsometric microscope
details.abstract: In order to study the interaction between C-reactive protein (CRP) and a biomerrbrane, an arti ficial phospholi pid with a long-spacer, DS8PC, was synthesized. Also, a new microscope, ell ipsometric microscope (EMM), was designed and constructed for studying film surfaces. Using the self-made EMM specific interaction of rabbit C-reactive protein (rCRP) with DS8 PC containing monolayers was studied.
